channel.title: ...on your own on Nginx Experience
channel.description: Recent content in ...on your own on Nginx Experience

item.title: Cloud Formation
item.description: Click the bellow button and deploy the template: Click Next and enter a unique “Stack name” Click Next 2 times accepting all the defaults, but make sure the following is selected on the last screen: Click Create stack. Wait until the stack Status is CREATE_COMPLETE.

item.title: IAM Role
item.description: Follow this deep link to find your Cloud9 EC2 instance Select the instance, then choose Actions / Instance Settings / Attach/Replace IAM Role Choose eksworkshop-admin from the IAM Role drop down, and select Apply
